mapper.select: select n.*, u.nickname as nickname, u.level_image from notice as n join user as u on n.user_idx = u.idx where n.idx=#{idx}
mapper.insert: insert into notice(user_idx, type, title, content) values(#{user_idx}, #{type}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: update notice set type=#{type}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, modify_date=now() where idx=#{idx}
